overview: Tits of Fury!  The evil Ninja Queen is back, conjuring ancient warriors to slay the Kung-Fu Girls and their beloved master. Number one son Wanker Wang steps in to lead the girls in their struggle against this insidious evil. You'll see gravity-defying martial arts moves such as the flying throat fuck, the 180-degree vagina plunge, and the gaping asshole slam fuck. Thank God the Kung-Fu Girls are on our side!
tagline: They'll Kick Your Ass & You'll Love It!
title: Kung-Fu Girls 3
